result.eng: I wake up at eight every morning.
result.ga: músclaím ag a hocht achan mhaidin
result.orig: Músclaím ag a hocht achan mhaidin
result.html: músclaím ag a hocht achan mhaidinI wake up at eight every morning.
result.ponchtml: músclaím ag a hoċt aċan ṁaidinI wake up at eight every morning.

result.eng: Myself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ga: téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche aoine
result.orig: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche Aoine
result.html: téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche aoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ponchtml: téim féin agus mo ḃean ċéile amaċ fá ċoinne béile aċan oíċe aoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
